thread.title: DroneWire Establishes Facebook Presence for UAV Industry News -
thread.title_full: DroneWire Establishes Facebook Presence for UAV Industry News - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DroneWire Establishes Facebook Presence for UAV Industry News -
text:
DroneWire will complement their comprehensive small Unmanned Aerial Systems news coverage with an active social media presence.
Prince William County, Virginia (PRWEB) September 20, 2015
DroneWire , a recently launched UAV industry news and resource website, announced the creation of their new Facebook page to complement the company’s round-the-clock coverage of the emerging commercial and enthusiast drone market.
Created and developed by technology veteran Bradley Caricofe, DroneWire uses a proprietary content aggregation platform that indexes hundreds of new UAV articles and videos every day. A team of experienced editors reviews each item based on a number of factors, and distributes the most relevant and useful articles through their website and social media channels.
“We’ve been working on this project since January, with core focus on providing valuable information on a timely basis to drone industry insiders, commercial operators, and dedicated enthusiasts. Our Facebook page represents a soft launch for our new service, and we hope our followers will find our content useful and informative,” said Caricofe.
In addition to aggregating UAV-related content from all around the web, DroneWire will feature original articles, interviews, case studies, product reviews, and a large database of drone companies and organizations. “We want to be viewed as a trusted authority source for information about this exciting growth industry; the sky’s the limit,” said Caricofe.
The company’s new Facebook page can be found at http://facebook.com/dronewire .
About DroneWire
DroneWire is a comprehensive online resource for the emerging commercial and enthusiast small Unmanned Aerial Systems (sUAS) industry. They are a leading digital publisher of UAV news, insight, and opinion. For more information, call 703-490-5595, or visit http://dronewire.com . Follow DroneWire on Facebook at http://fb.com/dronewire or on Twitter @thedronewire.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/news/drones/prweb12970088.htm
